Header2: Students Portal - For all your Student Needs
Footer1: DocuSign: The easiest way to get things done
Footer2: The most reliable and globally trusted service for electronic signatures and approvals. Over 200 million users worldwide

Card1.Title:
Change
a Major/Minor Field
Card1.Description: Submit a form requesting changes to your major and/or minor fields of study.
Card1.Features:
DocuSign Features:

  • Single Signer
  • DOCX Import
  • Auto-Place (Anchor) Positioning
  • Tabs are where data is entered by a signer
  • Embedded Signing
  • Sign without leaving the website

Card2.Title:
Request
for Unofficial Transcript
Card2.Description: Get your unofficial transcript in seconds.
Card2.Features:
DocuSign Features:

  • Send from a Template
  • Multiple Signers
  • Multiple Documents
  • Calculated (Formula) Tabs

Card3.Title:
Sign-up
for Extracurricular Activities
Card3.Description: One stop shop for all your non-academics passions.
Card3.Features:
DocuSign Features:

  • Sign & Initial Tabs
  • Custom Branding
  • Optional Signer Attachments
  • Routing Order
  • Image/PNG document
  • Complex Document Visibility
